You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesM M] > &mopf;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Mopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D544.
  * `&mopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D55E.
